Please review the below job description and share your updated resume, if you are available and interested in a long term contract role.Â Position:Â Â Â Â Â Â Â Data EngineerLocation:Â Â Â Â Â Â Seattle, WA or Burbank/Glendale/Anaheim CA (Remote Start)Duration:Â Â Â Â Â Â 05+ months of contract to Hire Â Job Description:Minimum Qualifications â¢ Expertise with SQL, data analysis, and reporting. â¢ Strong ability to organize, analyze, and disseminate information. â¢ Experience driving and completing projects through technical leadership in a complex, matrixed organization. â¢ Experience translating business needs into technical system requirements. â¢ Proactively identify and solve data issues with attention to detail. â¢ Experience working with multiple disparate, complex, large datasets. â¢ Eagerness to adapt and learn. â¢ Cloud data technologies Preferred Qualifications â¢ Experience writing software in Python. â¢ Experience with PYSPARK, Pandas or equivalent data platform. â¢ Proven experience in keeping up with emerging technologies. â¢ Knowledge and familiarity with data visualization and presentation tools and strategies. â¢ Understanding of data sovereignty and data localization and how they impact implementation for data processing, aggregation, analysis and presentation. â¢ Azure â¢ DatabricksThanks,Ankit BhardwajLead RecruiterapolisDirect (310) 929 2354 Cell (847) 469-3602www.apolisrises.comlinkedin.com/in/ankit-bhardwaj-463b7454
